segments.text: I'm just watching this whole scene unfold, and the tension is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet continues to pour water, relentless and unforgiving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is expanding, reflecting the overhead light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how unaware the woman is of her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate is absolute, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is teetering on that stool, inches away from a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the stool groaning under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite disgusting how easily accidents can happen when attention is elsewhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's innocent anticipation of a cookie adds another layer to this impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a ticking time bomb in slow motion.

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene here, or things will get much worse.
